weapons.name: Mace of Tristan
weapons.description: Type: Hand Weapon. Attacks made with this weapon count as having a Strength equal to the Toughness of the model they are attacking +1. If the Strength would be higher without this rule, ignore it. Whenever an enemy model suffers one or more hits from this weapon, roll a D6 at the end of the Initiative step for every hit. If one or more 4+ results are rolled, all Magical Weapons carried by the attacked models are reverted to its mundane type for the rest of the game.

weapons.name: Dragon Lance
weapons.description: Type: Lance. The wielder gains Breath Weapon (Strength 3, Flaming Attacks). Attacks with this weapon have Multiple Wounds (D3) in the Round of Combat directly after the wielder has charged into combat. This bonus can only be applied to attacks directed against the charged enemies.

armours.name: Crusader’s Helm
armours.description: Type: Plate Armour. Attacks againstthe wearer with Lethal Strike lose this special rule.

armours.name: Armour of Percival
armours.description: Type: Heavy Armour. The wearer gains +1 to its Ward Save to a maximum of 4+. Any Divine Attacks made against the wielder lose Divine Attacks.

talismans.name: Talisman of Roland
talismans.description: No unit may use the Stand and Shoot reaction when charged by the bearer’s unit. Furthermore, the bearer’s unit gains +1 to its Ward Save against any Ranged Attacks to a maximum of 4+. This cannot be used against Magical Attacks.

talismans.name: Blessed Scripture
talismans.description: Multiple Wounds suffered by the bearer are halved, rounded up.

enchanteditems.name: Storm Clarion
enchanteditems.description: One use only. This item may be activated at the start of any Player Turn. Enemy units cannot make Flying Movements during this player turn.

enchanteditems.name: Wafers of Penitence
enchanteditems.description: The bearer's unit is never disrupted when flanked by enemy units (but can still be disrupted by enemy units to its rear).

standards.name: The Oriflamme
standards.description: The bearer gains Fear. Enemy units in base contact with the bearer’s unit may not benefit from Hold Your Ground.

standards.name: Banner of the Last Charge
standards.description: All mounts in the bearer’s unit gain Impact Hits (1).

choices.name: Bowmen’s Stakes and Scoring with Skirmish
Gain Skirmishing and lose Scoring (15 max)
May replace Bow with Throwing Weapons
May exchange Shield for Paired Weapons
